abstract: Google has long considered becoming part owner of undersea cables.
snippet: Google has long considered becoming part owner of undersea cables.
lead_paragraph: The multitude of blogs that follow Google’s every move were abuzz Friday with news that the Internet search giant was considering joining a consortium, called Unity, that would lay high capacity underwater cables across the Pacific Ocean. Some even speculated that it was yet another foray by Google into the telecommunications business. Google is already considering a bid for wireless spectrum in the United States and is building cell phone software.
